description: An agent-based model simulating the spread of an epidemic in a city. Each person and location is modeled as an individual agent with their own attributes and behaviors.

behaviors.name: move_to_different_location
behaviors.description: The person moves to a different location, potentially affecting the infection rate of both the previous and the new location.

behaviors.name: interact_with_others
behaviors.description: The person interacts with others in their location, potentially spreading the infection.

parameters.interaction_rate: number of people interacted with per time step

behaviors.algorithm: Random selection of other agents in the same location

interactions.name: person_to_person_interaction
interactions.description: People interact with each other which can lead to the spread of the epidemic.

interactions.name: person_to_location_interaction
interactions.description: People move to different locations which can affect the infection rate of the location.

algorithms.infection_algorithm: Stochastic model based on infection rate and proximity of infected individuals
algorithms.recovery_algorithm: Stochastic model based on recovery rate
